title: Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | SB 1.13.55 | 2-11-2022
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.text: ओम अज्ञानति मिरान धस्या ज्ञानां जनिशला कया चक्षरुन मीलितं येना तस्मै श्री गुरवे नमहा
नमा ओम विश्णु पादाया कृष्ण प्रेष्ठाय भूतले श्री मते भक्ति वेदांत स्वामिन निति नामिने
नमस्ते सारस्वते देवे गौरवाणी प्रचारिने निर्विशेशा शुन्यवादी पास्चात्य देशतारिने
जाय श्री कृष्ण चैतन्या प्रभू नित्यानन्दा श्री अद्वै तगदाधरा श्रीवासादी गौरभक्त वृंदा
हरे कृष्ण, हरे कृष्ण, कृष्ट कृष्ण, हरे हरे, हरे राम, हरे राम, राम राम, हरे हरे
ओम नमो भगवते वासु देवाया, नारायनम नमस कृत्या, नरम चैवनरो तमम, देवीम सरस्वतीम व्यासम ततो जयमुदी रयेथ
In this session we will be discussing from the 55th verse of the 13th chapter of the 1st canto of Srimad Bhagavatam
शेत्रग्ञे प्रविलाप्यतं, ब्रह्मणी आत्मानं आधारे, घटां बरं इवां बरे
The meaning of this verse is
दृत्राष्ट्रा will have to amalgamate his pure identity with intelligence
and then merge into the supreme being with knowledge of his qualitative oneness as a living entity with the supreme Brahman
being freed
from the blocked sky he will have to rise to the spiritual sky
This is a typical philosophical verse in the Bhagavatam
which also is explaining the Vedanta philosophy
So what is that philosophy that is being explained here is
simplified by Srila Prabhupada in the Parpot
So basically in the verse
it is explaining densha
the Ashtanga Yoga system of practice
is ultimately meant for
liberation from material bondage
and how that liberation happen
technically is being explain
to some extent in this verse
so Srila Prabhup attached
in the parpor
the living being
by His desiring to joining it
over the material world and declining to cooperate with the Supreme Lord
contacts the sum total of the material world
let me go a little slow and let us try to understand what Srila Prabhupada is telling here
each one of us is living being and the characteristic of every living being is
the living being has the capacity or the ability to desire desire is integral with
the existence as spirit soul so you cannot be without desire at any stage
in any condition in any place in any situation any person cannot be desireless
so specifically a certain type of desire what is that desire to Lord it over the material world
I want to be the Lord now who is the Lord actually Krishna Krishna is eternally the Lord of the
material world the spiritual world
in the whole existence that is Krishna's position our position is not never to be the Lord
but if we develop a desire to be the Lord
and as a result of desiring to be the Lord what happens next we decline to cooperate with the
Supreme Lord
if we don't have a desire to Lord it over material nature then we act in our constitutional position
in our original state as loving devotional servant of Krishna so we are happily situated completely
blissfully nicely engaged in Krishna's service as a cooperator Krishna never forces
in the spiritual world anyone to serve him because he is not in need of service it's for our own
self-interest that we must serve Krishna but how is the service rendered lovingly with devotion
then we are happy we are perfectly situated but if we decline I don't want to serve Krishna then what do you want to do sir
I want to lord over
so that lording over is only possible under illusion
and that illusion exists only in the material world
so therefore desiring to lord over
and declining to cooperate with the supreme lord
the living entity contacts the sum total of the material world
called Mahatatva
the material world
the sum total of this material world
everything material
is the original substance
or the energy called as Mahatatva
this is a technical term
it's called Mahatatva
the sum total of all material energy
and finally
from this Mahatatva
from this sum total of the material energy
his false identity with the material world
false identity with the material world means
my false ego
your false ego
each person's false ego
each person's ahankara
ahankara is samskrit
word
the English equivalent is false ego
or false identity
so the contact of the living being with this Mahatatva
or the sum total of the material energy
gives rise to a false ego
and gives rise to
a particular kind of intelligence
and then a particular kind of mind
and particular set of senses
all these are developed by the living beings

सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब्सक्राइब करें और सब
identity originally we are all spiritual beings pure spirit we have our spiritual identity
in relationship with krishna we have our spiritual senses our spiritual mind our spiritual
intelligence our spiritual identity as loving servitor of krishna
but all that is covered when we come in contact with this mahat tattva
when a covering is generated suitable for the lording over
now by this yogic process particularly the shtanga yoga process or any yogic process
when his pure identity is realized in sastra
self-realization self-realization means i realize myself as pure spiritual identity
completely apart from this material body means material senses apart from the material mind
apart from the material intelligence apart from the material ego i am pure spiritual identity
one has to revert to the original position
by amalgamating amalgamating means bringing together combining the five gross elements
and the subtle elements mind and intelligence into the mahathuk va game
it is just like if a potter is making a clay pot he takes some clay
and then he mixes it with water and then shapes it into a pot and then bakes that pot in fire it
becomes a pot now the pot is used and when the pot is destroyed what happens the elements which went
into making the pot are all separated fire is separated then water is separated and the earth
as clay goes back to the earth similarly when we come in contact with this Mahat Tattva the pure
spiritual soul then we take little false ego little
material intelligence little material mind little material senses and then the material covering
called the gross and the subtle body is prepared and that becomes a dress for the spirit soul for
the living being material dress but self realization means we don't require this material
dress because the cause of all our material problems in this material existence represents
general of birth and death false understanding false identity all kinds of material misconceptions
material miseries material material uh uh material existence itself is completely
unnecessary so becoming free from this material existence means becoming
free of
तो अराओं के रूप में सुन रहे हैं। इसलिए अराओं उंदन दिया जाना है और एलिमेंट्स उनको बेट दबा देगा जो हम के लिए पहले शुरू कर रहे हैं।
बेगिनी वे ने वर बी कॉंटाइटेड में महात्तव थी दस गएटिंग फ्रीड फॉर थे क्लाक्शेस वह थे
थैंका पाप ला यहां इस टू मर्ज इन एग्जिस्टेंस आफ द सुपर सोल जो वह ने बिकंग फ्री फॉर ने महात्तत्व अ
then what is left is the spiritual identity of the spiritual
soul spirit soul in its pure identity is left behind and that has to merge into the super soul
merge means become one and what is this becoming one actually mean
in other words Prabhupada says he has to realize that qualitatively he is non-different from the
super soul it doesn't mean that I become the super soul merging into the super soul here does
not mean I become the super soul no always my identity as servant of the supreme lord and
supreme lord's identity as the master of everyone eternally remains that never changes that never
is lost never is never is at any time lost it always exists so realizing the oneness
qualitative oneness means one in quality I am spiritual by nature super soul or
quality I am spiritual by nature super soul or quality I am spiritual by nature super soul or
कृष्णा स्पिरिजुअल बै नीचिया
बट कृष्णा इस मास्तर
I am servant
सो non different
means not that
I
the servant becomes the master
no servant will never become the master
master will never become the servant
master is always master
eternally, कृष्णा is always
the master eternally
and all the living entities are eternally
servants
चीवेर स्वरूपो नित्येर कृष्णदासन
So, realizing the qualitative oneness means
I am pure spiritual personality
and that pure spiritual personality is
eternally the servant of Krishna
What kind of servant?
Loving, devotional servant
and when this qualitative oneness is realized
freed from the mahat-tattva coverings
or material coverings
one transcends the material sky
you rise above the material sky, material existence
and in the pure spiritual intelligence
becomes intelligent
engaged in transcendental loving service of the Lord
So, this is explained here
by Srila Prabhupada
what happened to Dhritarashtra
I will stop here
Thank you very much
Hare Krishna
